pages.text: $(li)The Ocean is a biome composed of vast expanses of water.$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)The surface of this biome is mainly composed by Gravel.$(br)$(li)You can find some water vegetation too, like Seagrass or Kelp Plants.

$(li)Some aquatic animals like Cods, Salmons, Cachalot Whales, Dolphins, and Squids can be found here too.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome introducing the word $(l)Ocean$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
